content:
path /v3/vet/account/energy/address
operationId VetGetEnergy
parameters
description Account address you want to get balance of
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
summary Get VeChain Account energy VTHO
description 5 credits per API callGet VeChain Account energy in VTHO VTHO is used for paying for the transaction fee
responses
200
schema
type object
energy
type string
description Balance in VTHO
description OK
